title: [Stone Steps]
description: At this junction of the dizzy flight of steps, the way splits.  To the northeast, the steps continue to climb toward a platform cut into the cliff wall.  This appears to be an entrance into a large dwelling perched atop the ramparts.  To the south, the steps pass over a chasm between the cliff face and a beautiful building constructed on the pillar rising from the foot of the precipice.

At this junction of the dizzy flight of steps, the way splits.  To the northeast, the steps continue to climb toward a platform cut into the cliff wall.  This appears to be an entrance into a large dwelling perched atop the ramparts.  To the south, the steps pass over a chasm between the cliff face and a beautiful building constructed on the pillar rising from the darkness of the canyon floor.  Torches stuck into gouges in the wall offer enough light to make a fairly safe climb.
